featured.text: Cartier-Bresson’s subsequent work to document Gandhi’s death and its immediate impact on the country became one of Life Magazine’s most prized photo essays.
Initial contact is made via e-mail, with subsequent communication usually by phone.
This in turn enriched subsequent rounds of conversation.

definition.en_def: Occurring or coming later in time; following.
definition.example: The subsequent chapters of the book explore different themes.
